title: Anytime I see a dead possum, dog, deer, cat or any other animal lying in the road, it seems to be gone soon thereafter. However, I\'ve never actually witnessed anyone disposing of it. How is someone notified of the dead animal, how are they discarded, and what department is in charge of this job?
text:
This recent story at StarNewsOnline.com should answer your question:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20101108/ARTICLES/101109666
